long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerses your browser in a serene night-time city view, showcasing softly glowing roads and a tranquil urban atmosphere. Designed for those who appreciate subtle elegance, this theme provides a calming and focused browsing experience.
